EDIT_STORY.TITLE: Edit Story
EDIT_STORY.SUBTITLE: Update your story content and details
EDIT_STORY.MODERATION_NOTICE_DESC: Significant changes to your story (title, content, or images) will require admin approval before being published.
EDIT_STORY.MODERATION_NOTICE_MAJOR_DESC: (content, title, images) will be set to pending
EDIT_STORY.MODERATION_NOTICE_NOTIFY: You'll be notified once an admin reviews your changes

EDIT_STORY.IMAGES_NONE: No images added yet. Add some images to make your story more engaging!
